    • Method Detail

      • createClient

        public PbcsClient createClient(PbcsConnection connection)
        Creates a new PbcsClient instances using the supplied conncetion details. A default service configuration will be created (default HTTP protocol, REST endpoints, etc.). If customization is needed (for example, to specify a particular API version), then the other createClient method should be used.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection details object
        Returns:
        a new PBCS client instance

      • createClient

        public PbcsClient createClient(PbcsConnection connection,
                               PbcsServiceConfiguration serviceConfiguration)
        Creates a new client instance with supplied connection and service configuration.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection details
        serviceConfiguration - the configuration details
        Returns:
        a new PBCS client instance

      • createPlanningClient

        public PbcsPlanningClient createPlanningClient(PbcsConnection connection)

      • createClient

        public PbcsClient createClient(String server,
                               String identityDomain,
                               String username,
                               String password)
        Convenience method for passing individual connection parameters instead of having to construct a PbcsConnection object. Interally just creates a connection object and calls the other createClient() method.
        Parameters:
        server - the PBCS server name (just a server, not a scheme, port, or path)
        identityDomain - the identity domain
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        a PbcsClient constructed with the given parameters

      • createDefaultServiceConfiguration

        public PbcsServiceConfigurationImpl createDefaultServiceConfiguration()
        Builds and returns a default service configuration, namely with the following are true: the scheme is https, the port is 443 (default HTTPS port), the API version for Planning is "v3", and the endpoint path for the API is /HyperionPlanning/rest/. These values should almost always be valid, but there may come a point where one of them needs to change, most likely the Planning API version, if/when it gets bumped to v4.

        Users needing advanced control over the configuration of their service configuration will want to instantiate their own, such as using the PbcsServiceConfigurationImpl class or rolling their own.

        Returns:
        a default service configuration
